dotnetType.name: RecordDeserializerBuilderCase
dotnetType.summary:
A deserializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.RecordSchema" /> and attempts to map
            it to classes or structs using property/fields to set values.

overloads.summary: Creates a new record deserializer builder case.

returns.summary:
A successful result if the resolution is a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.RecordResolution" /> and the
            schema is a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.RecordSchema" />; an unsuccessful result otherwise.

overloads.summary: Builds a record deserializer for a type-schema pair.

returns.summary: A schema that can be mapped to a surrogate type.

overloads.summary: Creates a schema that can be used to deserialize missing record fields.

returns.summary:
<see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> if the schema is an array schema (or a union schema
            containing only array/null schemas), <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> if the
            schema is a map schema (or a union schema containing only map/null schemas), and
            <see cref="T:System.Object" /> otherwise.

overloads.summary: Creates a type that can be used to deserialize missing record fields.
The deserializer builder to use to build field deserializers.

Attempts to find a constructor with a matching parameter for each of a record schemaâ€™s
            fields.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RecordDeserializerBuilderCase extends Chr.Avro.Serialization.BinaryDeserializerBuilderCase
